text: Dang tamen dakai liang dai shi, tamen faxian tamen [mai liang yong] de qiancai yi bei tuihuan gei tamen [you su fu tigong de liangshi wei shou qian]. Tamen shuo:“Women de fuqin a! Women hai neng yaoqiu shenme ne? Zhe shi women [mai liang] de qiancai, yi bei tuihuan gei women. Women jiang wei women de jiaren zai mai xie liangshi, women yiding baohu hao women de didi, women ke duo mai yi tuo liangshi, zhe shi rongyi huode de liangshi.”
